NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to HR Tech and Leadership or the cell corresponding to Employee Relations and Training Hours?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {HR Tech} and {Leadership} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Performance and Absenteeism or the cell corresponding to Employee Relations and Skills Gap?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Diversity & Inclusion and Satisfaction or the cell corresponding to Training and Turnover?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Training} and {Turnover} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Performance and Satisfaction or the cell corresponding to Recruitment and Skills Gap?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Recruitment} and {Skills Gap} has a higher heat value.
